titleStmt.title: The several opinions of sundry learned antiquaries viz. Mr. Justice Doddridge, Mr. Agar, Francis Tate, William Canden, and Ioseph Holland. Touching the antiquity, power, order, state, manner, persons and proceedings of the high-court of Parliament in England.
titleStmt.author: Doddridge, John, Sir, 1555-1628.
